properties.help: Policy for handling of all IPv4 ICMP echo requests

Disable processing of all IPv4 ICMP echo requests

valueHelp.description: Enable processing of broadcast IPv4 ICMP echo/timestamp requests
Disable processing of broadcast IPv4 ICMP echo/timestamp requests

valueHelp.description: Enable sending SNMP trap on firewall configuration change
Disable sending SNMP trap on firewall configuration change
